attributes.action: Stop giving 1 million pound houses to the unemployed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently we have seen a Nigerian single mother of 5 and an Afghan single mother given 1 million pound houses at the tax payers expence.  They could never afford to get a job that would pay their rent on these properties so why give them a luxury home. Child benefits should be limited to just 2 children and welfare given no greater than you could get if you earned the minimum wage.  Those who don't want to work should be re-located from London to Liverpool where rents are cheaper because they have plenty of empty homes.
